inclusion.criterion: Adult patients aged from 20 years to 60 years
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients scheduled for elective surgery after an 8-hour overnight fast after a light meal (200 ml milk, 50 g white cheese, and 120 g bread).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: American society of anesthesiologists physical status I-III.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: History of upper GIT morbidity (hiatus hernia and gastric cancer)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: A 5 months old male with empty scrotum at the right side, palpable testis in the left scrotum. Diagnostic laparoscopy showed an abdominal undescended testis.
